{{Description|"Cheer! Give praise! Be awed! Raise your glasses! Every night bereft of banqueting is a sordid squandering of sore, sober daylight... And, uh, those who are not yet of age may have grape juice instead!"}}
'''Let the People Rejoice''' is [[Furina]]'s [[Elemental Burst]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* An indicator will appear on screen upon reaching 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100% of the maximum Fanfare points. At 25%, 50%, and 75%, the indicator is a crowd that pops up from the bottom of the screen. At 100%, the indicator is a screen flash.
* If an HP drain effect is negated by [[Invincibility Frame]]s during [[Elemental Burst]]s or [[Mirror Reflection of Doom]]'s hold mode, Fanfare Stacks will not increase due to said effect.
* When recasting while Universal Revelry is still in effect, the Fanfare stacks will reset before the Skill DMG hits.<ref name="Furina Burst Mechanics">KQM Theorycrafting Library: [https://library.keqingmains.com/evidence/characters/hydro/furina#burst-mechanics Furina Burst Mechanics]</ref>
* Reviving a fallen party member will count as HP change and grant Fanfare stacks.<ref name="Furina Burst Mechanics"/>
